EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Transportation: Aircraft/Aerospace
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Transportaion: Aircraft and Aerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
From aircraft to the Mars Rover and equipment to operations, no other single company compares with DuPont in its ability to solve today’s aerospace challenges. We're continuously working to develop solutions such as lighter weight materials and safer ways to operate to meet the unique needs of the aerospace industry. So, whenever the need is to fly farther, faster, longer or safer, DuPont has leading-edge technologies and services to help you achieve new performance goals.
Please visit our website to for more information about the technologies and services to help you achieve new performance goals in the Aircraft/ Aerospace Industires.
http://www2.dupont.com/Aircraft_Aerospace/en_US/
DuPont Protection Solutions
